name: AI Agent Tool
semantic_context: Generates an action plan and executes it. Can use external tools.
natural_language_description: 这是 AI Agent Tool 节点。主要用于: Generates an action plan and executes it. Can use external tools.

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: AI Agent that can call other tools
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: AI Agent that can call other tools | (必填项)

text.name: text
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Prompt (User Message) | (必填项)

hasOutputParser.name: hasOutputParser
hasOutputParser.natural_language_description: 参数名: Require Specific Output Format | 默认值: False

notice.displayName: Connect an output parser on the canvas to specify the output format you require
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Connect an output parser on the canvas to specify the output format you require

needsFallback.name: needsFallback
needsFallback.natural_language_description: 参数名: Enable Fallback Model | 默认值: False

fallbackNotice.displayName: Connect an additional language model on the canvas to use it as a fallback if the main model fails
fallbackNotice.name: fallbackNotice
fallbackNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Connect an additional language model on the canvas to use it as a fallback if the main model fails

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: systemMessage (值: None) - The message that will be sent to the agent before the conversation starts
maxIterations (值: None) - The maximum number of iterations the agent will run before stopping
returnIntermediateSteps (值: None) - Whether or not the output should include intermediate steps the agent took
passthroughBinaryImages (值: None) - Whether or not binary images should be automatically passed through to the agent as image type messages
batching (值: None) - Batch processing options for rate limiting
